comments: Or, with a different offset, 12*n - 1. In any case, numbers congruent to -1 mod 12. - _Alonso del Arte_, May 29 2011

Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-1).
formula: a(n) = 2*a(n-1) - a(n-2). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 08 2011G.f.: (11+x)/(1-x)^2. - _Colin Barker_, Feb 19 2012A089911(2*a(n)) = 11. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 05 2013
prog: (PARI) a(n)=12*n+11(MAGMA) [12*n+11: n in [0..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 08 2011(Haskell)a017653 = (+ 11) . (* 12)  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 05 2013
